subject: Verify all task verification metadata
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run verification commands for all completed tasks to ensure they all pass.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All verification commands pass
- [ ] All task metadata is accurate

- Expected: All tests pass
